item.description:
Dear Friends,

I just received the invitation below from Carol White of the Friends of Fort Stark, and I wanted to make sure you're all aware of this event. The Friends of Fort Stark have been doing wonderful work at their beautiful and historic site located just down the road from Portsmouth Harbor Lighthouse, and this new exhibit looks like a wonderful addition.

If you can't make the opening on May 28, I urge you to visit Fort Stark on another day this summer. The museum will be open every Saturday from noon until 4 p.m. until Labor Day, and also the entire Memorial Day weekend.

 



Thank you,
Jeremy D'Entremont
Operations Manager, Friends of Portsmouth Harbor Lighthouses
item.how_to_find_us: no idea, but I hope I can make it, this sounds awesome ;) s
